15.verse: [CA] . . . . ak ana lukarnastaþin, jah liuteiþ allaim þaim in þamma garda.

16.verse: [CA] swa liuhtjai liuhaþ izwar in andwairþja manne, ei gasaihvaina izwara goda waurstwa jah hauhjaina attan izwarana þana in himinam.

17.verse: [CA] ni hugjaiþ ei qemjau gatairan witoþ aiþþau praufetuns; ni qam gatairan, ak usfulljan.

18.verse: [CA] amen auk qiþa izwis: und þatei usleiþiþ himins jah airþa, jota ains aiþþau ains striks ni usleiþiþ af witoda, unte allata wairþiþ.

19.verse: [CA] iþ saei nu gatairiþ aina anabusne þizo minnistono jah laisjai swa mans, minnista haitada in þiudangardjai himine; iþ saei taujiþ jah laisjai swa, sah mikils haitada in þiudangardjai himine.

20.verse: [CA] qiþa auk izwis þatei nibai managizo wairþiþ izwaraizos garaihteins þau þize bokarje jah Fareisaie, ni þau qimiþ in þiudangardjai himine.

21.verse: [CA] hausideduþ þatei qiþan ist þaim airizam: ni maurþrjais; iþ saei maurþreiþ skula wairþiþ stauai.

22.verse: [CA] aþþan ik qiþa izwis þatei hvazuh modags broþr seinamma sware, skula wairþiþ stauai; iþ saei qiþiþ broþr seinamma raka, skula wairþiþ gaqumþai; aþþan saei qiþiþ dwala, skula wairþiþ in gaiainnan funins.

23.verse: [CA] jabai nu bairais aibr þein du hunslastada jah jainar gamuneis þatei broþar þeins habaiþ hva bi þuk,

24.verse: [CA] aflet jainar þo giba þeina in andwairþja hunslastadis jah gagg faurþis gasibjon broþr þeinamma, jah biþe atgaggands atbair þo giba þeina.

25.verse: [CA] sijais waila hugjands andastauin þeinamma sprauto, und þatei is in wiga miþ imma, ibai hvan atgibai þuk sa andastaua stauin, jah sa staua þuk atgibai andbahta, jah in karkara galagjaza.

26.verse: [CA] amen qiþa þus: ni usgaggis jainþro, unte usgibis þana minnistan kintu.

27.verse: [CA] hausideduþ þatei qiþan ist: ni horinos.

28.verse: [CA] aþþan ik qiþa izwis, þatei hvazuh saei saihviþ qinon du luston izos, ju gahorinoda izai in hairtin seinamma.

29.verse: [CA] iþ jabai augo þein þata taihswo marzjai þuk, usstagg ita jah wairp af þus; batizo ist auk þus ei fraqistnai ains liþiwe þeinaize, jah ni allata leik þein gadriusai in gaiainnan.

30.verse: [CA] jah jabai taihswo þeina handus marzjai þuk, afmait þo jah wairp af þus; batizo ist auk þus ei fraqistnai ains liþiwe þeinaize, jah ni allata leik þein gadriusai in gaiainnan.

31.verse: [CA] qiþanuh þan ist þatei hvazuh saei afletai qen, gibai izai afstassais bokos.

32.verse: [CA] iþ ik qiþa izwis þatei hvazuh saei afletiþ qen seina, inuh fairina kalkinassaus, taujiþ þo horinon; jah sa ize afsatida liugaiþ, horinoþ.

33.verse: [CA] aftra hausideduþ þatei qiþan ist þaim airizam: ni ufarswarais, iþ usgibais fraujin aiþans þeinans.

34.verse: [CA] aþþan ik qiþa izwis ni swaran allis, ni bi himina, unte stols ist gudis;

35.verse: [CA] nih bi airþai, unte fotubaurd ist fotiwe is; nih bi Iairusaulwmai, unte baurgs ist þis mikilins þiudanis;

36.verse: [CA] nih bi haubida þeinamma swarais, unte ni magt ain tagl hveit aiþþau swart gataujan.

37.verse: [CA] sijaiþ~þan waurd izwar: ja, ja; ne, ne; iþ þata managizo þaim us þamma ubilin ist.

38.verse: [CA] hausideduþ þatei qiþan ist: augo und augin, jah tunþu und tunþau.

39.verse: [CA] iþ ik qiþa izwis ni andstandan allis þamma unseljin; ak jabai hvas þuk stautai bi taihswon þeina kinnu, wandei imma jah þo anþara.

40.verse: [CA] jah þamma wiljandin miþ þus staua jah paida þeina niman, aflet imma jah wastja.

41.verse: [CA] jah jabai hvas þuk ananauþjai rasta aina, gaggais miþ imma twos.

42.verse: [CA] þamma bidjandin þuk gibais, jah þamma wiljandin af þus leihvan sis ni uswandjais.

43.verse: [CA] hausideduþ þatei qiþan ist: frijos nehvundjan þeinana, jah fiais fiand þeinana.

44.verse: [CA] aþþan ik qiþa izwis: frijoþ fijands izwarans, þiuþjaiþ þans wrikandans izwis, waila taujaiþ þaim hatjandam izwis, jah bidjaiþ bi þans usþriutandans izwis,

45.verse: [CA] ei wairþaiþ sunjus attins izwaris þis in himinam, unte sunnon seina urranneiþ ana ubilans jah godans, jah rigneiþ ana garaihtans jah ana inwindans.

46.verse: [CA] jabai auk frijoþ þans frijondans izwis ainans, hvo mizdono habaiþ? niu jah þai þiudo þata samo taujand?

47.verse: [CA] jah jabai goleiþ þans frijonds izwarans þatainei, hve managizo taujiþ? niu jah motarjos þata samo taujand?

48.verse: [CA] sijaiþ nu jus fullatojai, swaswe atta izwar sa in himinam fullatojis ist.

1.verse: [CA] Atsaihviþ armaion izwara ni taujan in andwairþja manne du saihvan im; aiþþau laun ni habaiþ fram attin izwaramma þamma in himinam.

2.verse: [CA] þan nu taujais armaion, ni haurnjais faura þus, swaswe þai liutans taujand in gaqumþim jah in garunsim, ei hauhjaindau fram mannam; amen qiþa izwis: andnemun mizdon seina.

3.verse: [CA] iþ þuk taujandan armaion ni witi hleidumei þeina, hva taujiþ taihswo þeina,

4.verse: [CA] ei sijai so armahairtiþa þeina in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saihviþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus in bairhtein.

5.verse: [CA] jah þan bidjaiþ, ni sijaiþ swaswe þai liutans, unte frijond in gaqumþim jah waihstam plapjo standandans bidjan, ei gaumjaindau mannam. Amen, qiþa izwis þatei haband mizdon seina.

6.verse: [CA] iþ þu þan bidjais, gagg in heþjon þeina jah galukands haurdai þeinai bidei du attin þeinamma þamma in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saihviþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus in bairhtein.

7.verse: [CA] bidjandansuþ~þan ni filuwaurdjaiþ, swaswe þai þiudo; þugkeiþ im auk ei in filuwaurdein seinai andhausjaindau.

8.verse: [CA] ni galeikoþ nu þaim; wait auk atta izwar þizei jus þaurbuþ, faurþizei jus bidjaiþ ina.

9.verse: [CA] swa nu bidjaiþ jus: atta unsar þu in himinam, weihnai namo þein.

10.verse: [CA] qimai þiudinassus þeins. wairþai wilja þeins, swe in himina jah ana airþai.

11.verse: [CA] hlaif unsarana þana sinteinan gif uns himma daga.

12.verse: [CA] jah aflet uns þatei skulans sijaima, swaswe jah weis afletam þaim skulam unsaraim.

13.verse: [CA] jah ni briggais uns in fraistubnjai, ak lausei uns af þamma ubilin; unte þeina ist þiudangardi jah mahts jah wulþus in aiwins. amen.

14.verse: [CA] unte jabai afletiþ mannam missadedins ize, afletiþ jah izwis atta izwar sa ufar himinam.

15.verse: [CA] iþ jabai ni afletiþ mannam missadedins ize, ni þau atta izwar afletiþ missadedins izwaros.

16.verse: [CA] aþþan biþe fastaiþ, ni wairþaiþ swaswe þai liutans gaurai; frawardjand auk andwairþja seina, ei gasaihvaindau mannam fastandans. amen, qiþa izwis, þatei andnemun mizdon seina.

17.verse: [CA] iþ þu fastands salbo haubiþ þein jah ludja þeina þwah,

18.verse: [CA] ei ni gasaihvaizau mannam fastands, ak attin þeinamma þamma in fulhsnja, jah atta þeins saei saihviþ in fulhsnja, usgibiþ þus.

19.verse: [CA] ni huzdjaiþ izwis huzda ana airþai, þarei malo jah nidwa frawardeiþ, jah þarei þiubos ufgraband jah hlifand.

20.verse: [CA] iþ huzdjaiþ izwis huzda in himina, þarei nih malo nih nidwa frawardeiþ, jah þarei þiubos ni ufgraband nih stiland.

21.verse: [CA] þarei auk ist huzd izwar, þaruh ist jah hairto izwar.

22.verse: [CA] lukarn leikis ist augo: jabai nu augo þein ainfalþ ist, allata leik þein liuhadein wairþiþ;

23.verse: [CA] iþ jabai augo þein unsel ist, allata leik þein riqizein wairþiþ. jabai nu liuhaþ þata in þus riqiz ist, þata riqiz hvan filu!

24.verse: [CA] ni manna mag twaim fraujam skalkinon; unte jabai fijaiþ ainana, jah anþarana frijoþ; aiþþau ainamma ufhauseiþ, iþ anþaramma frakann. ni maguþ guda skalkinon jah mammonin.

25.verse: [CA] Duþþe qiþa izwis: ni maurnaiþ saiwalai izwarai hva matjaiþ jah hva drigkaiþ, nih leika izwaramma hve wasjaiþ; niu saiwala mais ist fodeinai jah leik wastjom?

26.verse: [CA] insaihviþ du fuglam himinis, þei ni saiand nih sneiþand, nih lisand in banstins, jah atta izwar sa ufar himinam fodeiþ ins. niu jus mais wulþrizans sijuþ þaim?

27.verse: [CA] iþ hvas izwara maurnands mag anaaukan ana wahstu seinana aleina aina?

28.verse: [CA] jah bi wastjos hva saurgaiþ? gakunnaiþ blomans haiþjos, hvaiwa wahsjand; nih arbaidjand nih spinnand.

29.verse: [CA] qiþuh þan izwis þatei nih Saulaumon in allamma wulþau seinamma gawasida sik swe ains þize.

30.verse: [CA] jah þande þata hawi haiþjos himma daga wisando jah gistradagis in auhn galagiþ guþ swa wasjiþ, hvaiwa mais izwis leitil galaubjandans?

31.verse: [CA] ni maurnaiþ nu qiþandans: hva matjam aiþþau hva drigkam aiþþau hve wasjaima?

32.verse: [CA] all auk þata þiudos sokjand; waituh þan atta izwar sa ufar himinam þatei þaurbuþ . . . .

12.verse: [CA] . . . . (tau)jaina izwis mans, swa jah jus taujaiþ im: þata auk ist witoþ jah praufeteis.

13.verse: [CA] inngaggaiþ þairh aggwu daur, unte braid daur jah rums wigs sa brigganda in fralustai, jah managai sind þai inngaleiþandans þairh þata.

14.verse: [CA] hvan aggwu þata daur jah þraihans wigs sa brigganda in libainai, jah fawai sind þai bigitandans þana.

15.verse: [CA] atsaihviþ sweþauh faura liugnapraufetum þaim izei qimand at izwis in wastjom lambe, iþ innaþro sind wulfos wilwandans.

16.verse: [CA] bi akranam ize ufkunnaiþ ins. ibai lisand[a] af þaurnum weinabasja aiþþau af wigadeinom smakkans?

17.verse: [CA] swa all bagme godaize akrana goda gataujiþ, iþ sa ubila bagms akrana ubila gataujiþ.

18.verse: [CA] ni mag bagms þiuþeigs akrana ubila gataujan, nih bagms ubils akrana þiuþeiga gataujan.

19.verse: [CA] all bagme ni taujandane akran god usmaitada jah in fon atlagjada.

20.verse: [CA] þannu bi akranam ize ufkunnaiþ ins.

21.verse: [CA] ni hvazuh saei qiþiþ mis: frauja, frauja! inngaleiþiþ in þiudangardja himine, ak sa taujands wiljan attins meinis þis in himinam.

22.verse: [CA] managai qiþand mis in jainamma daga: frauja, frauja! niu þeinamma namin praufetidedum, jah þeinamma namin unhulþons uswaurpum, jah þeinamma namin mahtins mikilos gatawidedum?

23.verse: [CA] jah þan andhaita im þatei ni hvanhun kunþa izwis: afleiþiþ fairra mis, jus waurkjandans unsibjona.

24.verse: [CA] hvazuh nu saei hauseiþ waurda meina jah taujiþ þo, galeiko ina waira frodamma, saei gatimrida razn sein ana staina.

25.verse: [CA] jah atiddja dalaþ rign jah qemun ahvos jah waiwoun windos jah bistugqun bi þamma razna jainamma, jah ni gadraus, unte gasuliþ was ana staina.

26.verse: [CA] jah hvazuh saei hauseiþ waurda meina jah ni taujiþ þo, galeikoda mann dwalamma, saei gatimrida razn sein ana malmin.

27.verse: [CA] jah atiddja dalaþ rign jah qemun ahvos jah waiwoun windos jah bistugqun bi jainamma razna, jah gadraus, jah was drus is mikils.

28.verse: [CA] jah warþ, þan ustauh Iesus þo waurda, biabridedun manageins ana laiseinai is.

29.verse: [CA] was auk laisjands ins swe waldufni habands, jah ni swaswe bokarjos.

1.verse: [CA] Dalaþ þan atgaggandin imma af fairgunja, laistidedun afar imma iumjons managos.

2.verse: [CA] jah sai, manna þrutsfill habands durinnands inwait ina qiþands: frauja, jabai wileis, magt mik gahrainjan.

3.verse: [CA] jah ufrakjands handu attaitok imma qiþands: wiljau, wairþ hrains! jah suns hrain warþ þata þrutsfill is.

4.verse: [CA] jah qaþ imma Iesus: saihv ei mann ni qiþais, ak gagg, þuk silban ataugei gudjin jah atbair giba þoei anabauþ Moses du weitwodiþai im.

5.verse: [CA] afaruh þan þata innatgaggandin imma in Kafarnaum, duatiddja imma hundafaþs bidjands ina

6.verse: [CA] jah qiþands: frauja, þiumagus meins ligiþ in garda usliþa, harduba balwiþs.

7.verse: [CA] jah qaþ du imma Iesus: ik qimands gahailja ina.

8.verse: [CA] jah andhafjands sa hundafaþs qaþ: frauja, ni im wairþs ei uf hrot mein inngaggais, ak þatainei qiþ waurda jah gahailniþ sa þiumagus meins.

9.verse: [CA] jah auk ik manna im habands uf waldufnja meinamma gadrauhtins jah qiþa du þamma: gagg, jah gaggiþ; jah anþaramma: qim, jah qimiþ; jah du skalka meinamma: tawei þata, jah taujiþ.

10.verse: [CA] gahausjands þan Iesus sildaleikida jah qaþ du þaim afarlaistjandam: amen, qiþa izwis, ni in Israela swalauda galaubein bigat.

11.verse: [CA] aþþan qiþa izwis þatei managai fram urrunsa jah saggqa qimand, jah anakumbjand miþ Abrahama jah Isaka jah Iakoba in þiudangardjai himine:

12.verse: [CA] iþ þai sunjus þiudangardjos uswairpanda in riqis þata hindumisto; jainar wairþiþ grets jah krusts tunþiwe.

13.verse: [CA] jah qaþ Iesus þamma hundafada: gagg, jah swaswe galaubides wairþai þus. jah gahailnoda sa þiumagus is in jainai hveilai.

14.verse: [CA] jah qimands Iesus in garda Paitraus, jah gasahv swaihron is ligandein in heitom.

15.verse: [CA] jah attaitok handau izos jah aflailot ija so heito; jah urrais jah andbahtida imma.

16.verse: [CA] at andanahtja þan waurþanamma, atberun du imma daimonarjans managans, jah uswarp þans ahmans waurda jah allans þans ubil habandans gahailida,

17.verse: [CA] ei usfullnodedi þata gamelido þairh Esaïan praufetu qiþandan: sa unmahtins unsaros usnam jah sauhtins usbar.

18.verse: [CA] gasaihvands þan Iesus managans hiuhmans bi sik, haihait galeiþan siponjans hindar marein.

19.verse: [CA] jah duatgaggands ains bokareis qaþ du imma: laisari, laistja þuk, þishvaduh þadei gaggis.

20.verse: [CA] jah qaþ du imma Iesus: fauhons grobos aigun, jah fuglos himinis sitlans, iþ sunus mans ni habaiþ hvar haubiþ sein anahnaiwjai.

21.verse: [CA] anþaruh þan siponje is qaþ du imma: frauja, uslaubei mis frumist galeiþan jah gafilhan attan meinana.

22.verse: [CA] iþ Iesus qaþ du imma: laistei afar mis jah let þans dauþans <ga>filhan seinans dauþans.

23.verse: [CA] jah innatgaggandin imma in skip, afariddjedun imma siponjos is.

24.verse: [CA] jah sai, wegs mikils warþ in marein, swaswe þata skip gahuliþ wairþan fram wegim; iþ is saislep.

25.verse: [CA] jah duatgaggandans siponjos is urraisidedun ina qiþandans: frauja, nasei unsis, fraqistnam.

26.verse: [CA] jah qaþ du im Iesus: hva faurhteiþ, leitil galaubjandans! þanuh urreisands gasok windam jah marein, jah warþ wis mikil.

27.verse: [CA] iþ þai mans sildaleikidedun qiþandans: hvileiks ist sa, ei jah windos jah marei ufhausjand imma?

28.verse: [CA] jah qimandin imma hindar marein in gauja Gairgaisaine, gamotidedun imma twai daimonarjos us hlaiwasnom rinnandans, sleidjai filu, swaswe ni mahta manna usleiþan þairh þana wig jainana.

29.verse: [CA] jah sai, hropidedun qiþandans: hva uns jah þus, Iesu, sunau gudis? qamt her faur mel balwjan unsis?

30.verse: [CA] Wasuh þan fairra im hairda sweine managaize haldana.

31.verse: [CA] iþ þo skohsla bedun ina qiþandans: jabai uswairpis uns, uslaubei uns galeiþan in þo hairda sweine.

32.verse: [CA] jah qaþ du im: gaggiþ! iþ eis usgaggandans galiþun in hairda sweine; jah sai, run gawaurhtedun sis alla so hairda and driuson in marein jah gadauþnodedun in watnam.

33.verse: [CA] iþ þai haldandans gaþlauhun jah galeiþandans gataihun in baurg all bi þans daimonarjans.

34.verse: [CA] jah sai, alla so baurgs usiddja wiþra Iesu, jah gasaihvandans ina bedun ei usliþi hindar markos ize.

1.verse: [CA] Jah atsteigands in skip ufarlaiþ jah qam in seinai baurg.

2.verse: [CA] þanuh atberun du imma usliþan ana ligra ligandan. jah gasaihvands Iesus galaubein ize qaþ du þamma usliþin: þrafstei þuk, barnilo! afletanda þus frawaurhteis þeinos.

3.verse: [CA] þaruh sumai þize bokarje qeþun in sis silbam: sa wajamereiþ.

4.verse: [CA] jah witands Iesus þos mitonins ize qaþ: duhve jus mitoþ ubila in hairtam izwaraim?

5.verse: [CA] hvaþar ist raihtis azetizo qiþan: afletanda þus frawaurhteis, þau qiþan: urreis jah gagg?

6.verse: [CA] Aþþan ei witeiþ þatei waldufni habaiþ sa sunus mans ana airþai afleitan frawaurhtins, þanuh qaþ du þamma usliþin: urreisands nim þana ligr þeinana jah gagg in gard þeinana.

7.verse: [CA] jah urreisands galaiþ in gard seinana.

8.verse: [CA] gasaihvandeins þan manageins ohtedun sildaleikjandans jah mikilidedun guþ þana gibandan waldufni swaleikata mannam.

9.verse: [CA] jah þairhleiþands Iesus jainþro gasahv mannan sitandan at motai, Maþþaiu haitanana, jah qaþ du imma: laistei afar mis. jah usstandands iddja afar imma.

10.verse: [CA] jah warþ, biþe is anakumbida in garda, jah sai, managai motarjos jah frawaurhtai qimandans miþanakumbidedun Iesua jah siponjam is.

11.verse: [CA] jah gaumjandans Fareisaieis qeþun du þaim siponjam is: duhve miþ motarjam jah frawaurhtaim matjiþ sa laisareis izwar?

12.verse: [CA] iþ Iesus gahausjands qaþ du im: ni þaurbun hailai lekeis, ak þai unhaili habandans.

13.verse: [CA] Aþþan gaggaiþ, ganimiþ hva sijai: armahairtiþa wiljau jah ni hunsl; niþ~þan qam laþon uswaurhtans, ak frawaurhtans.

14.verse: [CA] þanuh atiddjedun siponjos Iohannes qiþandans: duhve weis jah Fareisaieis fastam filu, iþ þai siponjos þeinai ni fastand?

15.verse: [CA] jah qaþ du im Iesus: ibai magun sunjus bruþfadis qainon und þata hveilos þei miþ im ist bruþfaþs? iþ atgagggand dagos, þan afnimada af im sa bruþfaþs, jah þan fastand.

16.verse: [CA] aþþan ni hvashun lagjiþ du plata fanan þarihis ana snagan fairnjana, unte afnimiþ fullon af þamma snagin, jah wairsiza gataura wairþiþ.

17.verse: [CA] Niþ~þan giutand wein niujata in balgins fairnjans, aiþþau distaurnand balgeis; biþeh þan jah wein usgutniþ jah balgeis fraqistnand; ak giutand wein juggata in balgins niujans, jah bajoþum gabairgada.

18.verse: [CA] miþþanei is rodida þata du im, þaruh reiks ains qimands inwait ina, qiþands þatei dauhtar meina nu gaswalt; akei qimands atlagei handu þeina ana ija, jah libaiþ.

19.verse: [CA] jah urreisands Iesus iddja afar imma jah siponjos is.

20.verse: [CA] jah sai, qino bloþarinnandei ·ib· wintruns duatgaggandei aftaro attaitok skauta wastjos is;

21.verse: [CA] qaþuh auk in sis: jabai þatainei atteka wastjai is, ganisa.

22.verse: [CA] iþ Iesus gawandjands sik jah gasaihvands þo qaþ: þrafstei þuk dauhtar! galaubeins þeina ganasida þuk. jah ganas so qino fram þizai hveilai jainai.

23.verse: [CA] jah qimands Iesus in garda þis reikis jah gasaihvands swigljans [jah haurnjans haurnjandans] jah managein auhjondein, qaþ du im:

24.verse: [CA] afleiþiþ, unte ni gaswalt so mawi, ak slepiþ. jah bihlohun ina.

25.verse: [CA] þanuh þan usdribana warþ so managei, atgaggands inn habaida handu izos, jah urrais so mawi.

26.verse: [CA] jah usiddja meriþa so and alla jaina airþa.

27.verse: [CA] jah hvarbondin Iesua jainþro, laistidedun afar imma twai blindans, hropjandans jah qiþandans: armai uggkis, sunau Daweidis!

28.verse: [CA] Qimandin þan in garda duatiddjedun imma þai blindans jah qaþ im Iesus: ga~u~laubjats þatei magjau þata taujan? Qeþun du imma: jai, frauja!

29.verse: [CA] þanuh attaitok augam ize qiþands: bi galaubeinai iggqarai wairþai iggqis.

30.verse: [CA] jah usluknodedun im augona, jah inagida ins Iesus qiþands: saihvats ei manna ni witi.

31.verse: [CA] iþ eis usgaggandans usmeridedun ina in allai airþai jainai.

32.verse: [CA] þanuh biþe utusiddjedun eis, sai, atberun imma mannan baudana daimonari.

33.verse: [CA] jah biþe usdribans warþ unhulþo, rodida sa dumba, jah sildaleikidedun manageins qiþandans: ni aiw swa uskunþ was in Israela.

34.verse: [CA] iþ Fareisaieis qeþun: in fauramaþlja unhulþono usdreibiþ unhulþons.

35.verse: [CA] jah bitauh Iesus baurgs allos jah haimos laisjands in gaqumþim ize, jah merjands aiwaggeljon þiudangardjos jah hailjands allos sauhtins jah alla unhailja.

36.verse: [CA] gasaihvands þan þos manageins infeinoda in ize, unte wesun afdauidai jah frawaurpanai swe lamba ni habandona hairdeis.

37.verse: [CA] þanuh qaþ du siponjam seinaim: asans raihtis managa, iþ waurstwjans fawai.

38.verse: [CA] bidjiþ nu fraujan asanais ei ussandjai waurstwjans in asan seina.

23.verse: [CA] . . . . þizai baurg, þliuhaiþ in anþara: amen auk qiþa izwis, ei ni ustiuhiþ baurgs Israelis, unte qimiþ sa sunus mans.

24.verse: [CA] nist siponeis ufar laisarja nih skalks ufar fraujin seinamma.

25.verse: [CA] Ganah siponi ei wairþai swe laisareis is jah skalks swe frauja is; jabai gardawaldand Baiailzaibul haihaitun, und hvan filu mais þans innakundans is.

26.verse: [CA] ni nunu ogeiþ izwis ins; ni waiht auk ist gahuliþ, þatei ni andhuljaidau, jah fulgin, þatei ni ufkunnaidau.

27.verse: [CA] þatei qiþa izwis in riqiza, qiþaiþ in liuhada, jah þatei in auso gahauseiþ, merjaiþ ana hrotam.

28.verse: [CA] jah ni ogeiþ izwis þans usqimandans leika þatainei, iþ saiwalai ni magandans usqiman, iþ ogeiþ mais þana magandan jah saiwalai jah leika fraqistjan in gaiainnan.

29.verse: [CA] niu twai sparwans assarjau bugjanda? jah ains ize ni gadriusiþ ana airþa inuh attins izwaris wiljan.

30.verse: [CA] aþþan izwara jah tagla haubidis alla garaþana sind.

31.verse: [CA] ni nunu ogeiþ; managaim sparwam batizans sijuþ jus.

32.verse: [CA] Sahvazuh nu saei andhaitiþ mis in andwairþja manne, andhaita jah ik imma in andwairþja attins meinis saei in himinam ist.

33.verse: [CA] iþ þishvanoh saei afaikiþ mik in andwairþja manne, afaika jah ik ina in andwairþja attins meinis þis saei in himinam ist.

34.verse: [CA] nih ahjaiþ þatei qemjau lagjan gawairþi ana airþa; ni qam lagjan gawairþi, ak hairu.

35.verse: [CA] qam auk skaidan mannan wiþra attan is jah dauhtar wiþra aiþein izos jah bruþ wiþra swaihron izos;

37.verse: [CA] saei frijoþ attan aiþþau aiþein ufar mik, nist meina wairþs; jah saei frijoþ sunu aiþþau dauhtar ufar mik, nist meina wairþs.

38.verse: [CA] jah saei ni nimiþ galgan seinana jah laistjai afar mis, nist meina wairþs.

39.verse: [CA] saei bigitiþ saiwala seina, fraqisteiþ izai; jah saei fraqisteiþ saiwalai seinai in meina, bigitiþ þo.

40.verse: [CA] sa andnimands izwis mik andnimiþ, jah sa mik andnimands andnimiþ þana sandjandan mik.

41.verse: [CA] sa andnimands praufetu in namin praufetaus mizdon praufetaus nimiþ, jah sa andnimands garaihtana in namin garaihtis mizdon garaihtis nimiþ.

42.verse: [CA] jah saei gadragkeiþ ainana þize minnistane stikla kaldis watins þatainei in namin siponeis, amen qiþa izwis, ei ni fraqisteiþ mizdon seinai.

1.verse: [CA] Jah warþ, biþe usfullida Iesus anabiudands þaim twalif siponjam seinaim, ushof sik jainþro du laisjan jah merjan and baurgs ize.

2.verse: [CA] iþ Iohannes gahausjands in karkarai waurstwa Xristaus, insandjands bi siponjam seinaim qaþ du imma:

3.verse: [CA] þû is sa qimanda þau anþarizuh beidaima?

4.verse: [CA] jah andhafjands Iesus qaþ du im: gaggandans gateihiþ Iohanne þatei gahauseiþ jah gasaihviþ.

5.verse: [CA] blindai ussaihvand, jah haltai gaggand, þrutsfillai hrainjai wairþand, jah baudai gahausjand, jah dauþai urreisand, jah unledai wailamerjanda:

6.verse: [CA] jah audags ist hvazuh saei ni gamarzjada in mis.

7.verse: [CA] at þaim þan afgaggandam, dugann Iesus qiþan þaim manageim bi Iohannen: hva usiddjeduþ ana auþida saihvan? raus fram winda wagidata?

8.verse: [CA] akei hva usiddjeduþ saihvan? mannan hnasqjaim wastjom gawasidana? sai, þaiei hnasqjaim wasidai sind, in gardim þiudane sind.

9.verse: [CA] akei hva usiddjeduþ saihvan? praufetu? jai, qiþa izwis: jah managizo praufetau.

10.verse: [CA] sa ist auk bi þanei gameliþ ist: sai, ik insandja aggilu meinana faura þus, saei gamanweiþ wig þeinana faura þus.

11.verse: [CA] amen, qiþa izwis: ni urrais in baurim qinono maiza Iohanne þamma daupjandin; iþ sa minniza in þiudangardjai himine maiza imma ist.

12.verse: [CA] framuh þan þaim dagam Iohannis þis daupjandins und hita þiudangardi himine anamahtjada, jah anamahtjandans frawilwand þo.

13.verse: [CA] allai auk praufeteis jah witoþ und Iohanne fauraqeþun;

14.verse: [CA] jah jabai wildedeiþ miþniman, sa ist Helias, saei skulda qiman.

17.verse: [CA] (jah) (qiþan)dam: swiglodedum izw(is) (jah) ni plinsideduþ; huf(um) (jah) ni qainodeduþ.

18.verse: [CA] qam raihtis Iohan(nes) (nih) (mat)jands nih drigkan(ds) (jah) (qi)þand: unhulþ(on) (habaiþ).

19.verse: [CA] (qam) sa sunus mans (matjands) (jah) drigkands j(ah) (qiþand): (sai), (man)na afetja jah af(drug)kja, (mo)tarje frijonds jah frawaurhtaize. jah uswaurhta gadomida warþ handugei fram barnam seinaim.

20.verse: [CA] þanuh dugann idweitjan baurgim, in þaimei waurþun þos managistons mahteis is, (þatei) (ni) (idreigodedun) sik.

21.verse: [CA] (wai) (þus) (Kaurazein), (wai) (þ)us Beþ(saïdan); (unte) (iþ) (wa)urþeina (in) (Twre) (jah) (Seidon)e landa mah(teis) (þos) (waur)þanons in izwis, (airis) (þ)au in sakkau jah azgon (idreig)odedeina.

22.verse: [CA] sweþauh qi(þa) (izwis): Twrim jah Seidonim (sutizo) (wa)irþiþ in daga stau(os) (þau) (izwis).

23.verse: [CA] jah þu Kafarna(um), (þu) (und) (hi)min ushauhida, (dalaþ) (und) (halj)a galeiþis: (unte) (jabai) (in) (S)audaumjam (waur)þe(ina) (m)ahteis þos waurþanons in izwis, aiþþau eis weseina und hina dag.

24.verse: [CA] sweþauh qiþa izwis þatei airþai Saudaumje sutizo wairþiþ in daga stauos þau þus.

38.verse: [C] hvanuh þan þuk sehvum gast jah galaþodedum? aiþþau naqadana jah wasidedum?

39.verse: [C] hvanuh þan þuk sehvum siukana aiþþau in karkarai jah atiddjedum du þus?

40.verse: [C] jah andhafjands sa þiudans qiþiþ du im: amen, qiþa izwis: jah þanei tawideduþ ainamma þize minnistane broþre meinaize, mis tawideduþ.

41.verse: [C] þanuh qiþiþ jah þaim af hleidumein ferai: gaggiþ fairra mis, jus fraqiþanans, in fon þata aiweino, þata manwido unhulþin jah aggilum is.

42.verse: [C] unte gredags was jan~ni gebuþ mis matjan; afþaursiþs was jan~ni dragkideduþ mik;

43.verse: [C] gasts <was> jan~ni galaþ(ode)duþ mik; naqaþs jan~ni waside(duþ) mik; siuks jah in karkarai jan~ni gaweisodeduþ meina.

44.verse: [C] þanuh andhafjand jah þai qiþandans: frauja, hvan þuk sehvum gredagana aiþþau afþaursidana aiþþau gast aiþþau naqadana aiþþau siukana aiþþau in karkarai jan~ni andbahtidedeima þus?

45.verse: [C] þanuh andhafjiþ im qiþands: amen, qiþa izwis, jah þanei ni tawideduþ ainamma þize leitilane, mis ni tawideduþ.

46.verse: [C] jah galeiþand þai in balwein aiweinon, iþ þai garaihtans in libain aiweinon.

1.verse: [C] Jah warþ, biþe ustauh Iesus alla þo waurda, qaþ siponjam sein(aim):

2.verse: [C] wituþ þatei afar twans dagans p(aska) wairþiþ, jas~sa sunus mans atg(iba)da du ushramjan.

65.verse: [C] . . . . þaurbum weitwode? sai, nu gahausideduþ þo wajamerein is.

66.verse: [C] hva izwis þugkeiþ? iþ eis andhafjandans qeþun: skula dauþaus ist.

67.verse: [C] þanuh spiwun ana andawleizn is jah kaupastedun ina; sumaiþ~þan lofam slohun

68.verse: [C] qiþandans: praufetei unsis, Xristu, hvas ist sa slahands þuk?

69.verse: [C] iþ Paitrus uta sat ana rohsnai, jah duatiddja imma aina þiwi qiþandei: jah þu wast miþ Iesua þamma Galeilaiau.

70.verse: [C] iþ is laugnida faura þaim allaim qiþands: ni wait hva qiþis.

71.verse: [C] usgaggandan þan ina in daur, gasahv ina anþara jah qaþ du þaim jainar: jas~sa was miþ Iesua þamma Nazoraiau.

72.verse: [C] jah aftra laugnida miþ aiþa swarands þatei ni kann þana mannan.

73.verse: [C] afar leitil þan atgaggandans þai stand<and>ans qeþun Paitrau: bi sunjai, jah þu þize is; jah auk razda þeina bandweiþ þuk.

74.verse: [C] þanuh dugann afdomjan jah swaran þatei ni kann þana mannan. jah suns hana hrukida.

75.verse: [C] jah gamunda Paitrus waurdis Iesuis qiþanis du sis: þatei faur hanins hruk þrim sinþam inwidis mik. jah usgaggands ut gaigrot baitraba.

1.verse: [C] At maurgin þan waurþanana, garuni nemun allai þai gudjans jah þai . . . .

2.verse: [CA] jah gabindandans ina gatauhun jah anafulhun ina Pauntiau Peilatau kindina.

3.verse: [CA] þanuh gasaihvands Iudas sa galewjands ina þatei du stauai gatauhans warþ, idreigonds gawandida þans þrins tiguns silubrinaize gudjam jah sinistam

4.verse: [CA] qiþands: frawaurhta mis galewjands bloþ swikn. iþ eis qeþun: hva kara unsis? þu witeis.

5.verse: [CA] jah atwairpands þaim silubr<ein>am in alh aflaiþ, jah galeiþands ushaihah sik.

6.verse: [CA] iþ þai gudjans nimandans þans skattans qeþun: ni skuld ist lagjan þans in kaurbaunan, unte andawairþi bloþis ist.

7.verse: [CA] garuni þan nimandans usbauhtedun us þaim þana akr kasjins, du usfilhan ana gastim.

8.verse: [CA] duþþe haitans warþ akrs jains akrs bloþis und hina dag.

9.verse: [CA] þanuh usfullnoda þata qiþano þairh Iairaimian praufetu qiþandan: jah usnemun þrins tiguns silubreinaize andawairþi þis wairþodins, þatei garahnidedun fram sunum Israelis,

10.verse: [CA] jah atgebun ins und akra kasjins, swaswe anabauþ mis frauja.

11.verse: [CA] iþ Iesus stoþ faura kindina, jah frah ina sa kindins qiþands: þu is þiudans Iudaie? iþ Iesus qaþ du imma: þu qiþis.

12.verse: [CA] jah miþþanei wrohiþs was fram þaim gudjam jah sinistam, ni waiht andhof.

13.verse: [CA] þanuh qaþ du imma Peilatus: niu hauseis hvan filu ana þuk weitwodjand?

14.verse: [CA] jah ni andhof imma wiþra ni ainhun waurde, swaswe sildaleikida sa kindins filu.

15.verse: [CA] and dulþ þan hvarjoh biuhts was sa kindins fraletan ainana þizai managein bandjan, þanei wildedun.

17.verse: [CA] gaqumanaim þan im, qaþ im Peilatus: hvana wileiþ ei fraletau izwis? Barabban þau Iesu, saei haitada Xristus?

18.verse: [CA] wissa auk þatei in neiþis atgebun ina.

19.verse: [CA] sitandin þan imma ana stauastola, insandida du imma qens is qiþandei: ni waiht þus jah þamma garaihtin . . . .

42.verse: [CA] . . . . Israelis ist, atsteigadau nu af þamma galgin [ei gasaihvaima] jah galaubjam imma.

43.verse: [CA] trauaida du guda; lausjadau nu ina, jabai wili ina; qaþ auk þatei gudis im sunus.

44.verse: [CA] þatuh samo jah þai waidedjans þai miþushramidans imma idweitidedun imma.

45.verse: [CA] fram saihston þan hveilai warþ riqis ufar allai airþai und hveila niundon.

46.verse: [CA] iþ þan bi hveila niundon ufhropida Iesus stibnai mikilai qiþands: helei, helei, lima sibakþani, þatei ist: guþ meins, guþ meins, duhve mis bilaist?

47.verse: [CA] iþ sumai þize jainar standandane gahausjandans qeþun þatei Helian wopeiþ sa.

48.verse: [CA] jah suns þragida ains us im jah nam swamm fulljands aketis, jah lagjands ana raus draggkida ina.

49.verse: [CA] iþ þai anþarai qeþun: let, ei saihvam, qimaiu Helias nasjan ina.

50.verse: [CA] iþ Iesus aftra hropjands stibnai mikilai aflailot ahman.

51.verse: [CA] jah þan faurhah alhs diskritnoda in twa, iupaþro und dalaþ, jah airþa inreiraida, jah stainos disskritnodedun,

52.verse: [CA] jah hlaiwasnos usluknodedun, jah managa leika þize ligandane weihaize urrisun.

53.verse: [CA] jah usgaggandans us hlaiwasnom afar urrist is innatgaggandans in þo weihon baurg jah ataugidedun sik managaim.

54.verse: [CA] iþ hundafaþs jah þai miþ imma witandans Iesua, gasaihvandans þo reiron jah þo waurþanona, ohtedun abraba, qiþandans: bi sunjai gudis sunus ist sa.

55.verse: [CA] wesunuh þan jainar qinons managos fairraþro saihvandeins, þozei laistidedun afar Iesua fram Galeilaia, andbahtjandeins imma,

56.verse: [CA] in þaimei was Marja so Magdalene, jah Marja so Iakobis jah Iosezis aiþei, jah aiþei suniwe Zaibaidaiaus.

57.verse: [CA] iþ þan seiþu warþ, qam manna gabigs af Areimaþaias þizuh namo Iosef, saei jah silba siponida Iesua.

58.verse: [CA] sah atgaggands du Peilatau baþ þis leikis Iesuis. þanuh Peilatus uslaubida giban þata leik.

59.verse: [CA] jah nimands þata leik Iosef biwand ita sabana hrainjamma

60.verse: [CA] jah galagida ita in niujamma seinamma hlaiwa þatei ushuloda ana staina jah faurwalwjands staina mikilamma daurons þis hlaiwis galaiþ.

61.verse: [CA] wasuh þan jainar Marja Magdalene jah so anþara Marja sitandeins andwairþis þamma hlaiwa.

62.verse: [CA] iftumin þan daga, saei ist afar paraskaiwein, gaqemun auhumistans gudjans jah Fareisaieis du Peilatau

63.verse: [CA] qiþandans: frauja, gamundedum þatei jains airzjands qaþ nauh libands: afar þrins dagans urreisa.

64.verse: [CA] hait nu witan þamma hlaiwa und þana þridjan dag, ibai ufto qimandans þai siponjos is binimaina imma jah qiþaina du managein: urrais us dauþaim, jah ist so speidizei airziþa wairsizei þizai frumein.

65.verse: [CA] qaþ im Peilatus: habaiþ wardjans, gaggiþ witaiduh swaswe kunnuþ.

66.verse: [CA] iþ eis gaggandans galukun þata hlaiw, faursigljandans þana . . . .
